baseline_rules.name: Allow Local File Sharing to private IP addresses
Allow UPnP Discovery from private IP addresses
Allow Web Service requests from private IP addresses
Allow LLMNR from private IP addresses
Allow Web Services Discovery from private IP addresses
Allow SSDP from private IP addresses
Block broadcast and multicast traffic and don't log
Block all other IP traffic and log
Block all other traffic and don't log

enforced_rules.name: Allow Mac Discovery from local computers
Block Mac Discovery from external computers

baseline_rules.name: Allow Local File Sharing to private IP addresses
Block Local File Sharing to external computers
Allow UPnP Discovery from private IP addresses
Allow SSDP from private IP addresses
Block broadcast and multicast traffic and don't log
Block all other IP traffic and log
